title: Expected Attendees at Tonight's Singapore State Dinner | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the First Lady


For Immediate Release
August 02, 2016

 



Expected Attendees at Tonight's Singapore State Dinner





Below is a list of expected attendees at tonight’s Singapore State Dinner. Additional details about the State Dinner are available HERE.

THE PRESIDENT AND MRS. OBAMA
